resources.string: e.g CMS01 Mon 8:30-9:30 at ABC Hall, CMS02 Tue 2:00-4:30 at Room 003

SimplyTimely is a responsive scheduling app that seeks to make it easy for students to know their programs through simple sms. It has a wide industrial applications including in workplaces. This application aims at helping individuals find specific information from other people by sending given sms keycode / keyword to their mobile numbers.
